services

Class CredentialService

  • java.lang.Object
    • services.CredentialService

  • public class CredentialService
extends java.lang.Object
    Credential Service class used to verifty user credentials before submitting them to the UserDAO class.
    Author:
    Aran

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CredentialService()
      Creates an instance of the UserDAO, EmailService and CredentialSubmissionResponse classes

      Checks for nulls in the arguments passed, verifies that the String array is of the correct length (2), and verifies if the email provided is authentic.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CredentialService

        public CredentialService()
        Creates an instance of the UserDAO, EmailService and CredentialSubmissionResponse classes

    • Method Detail

      • submitCredentials

        public CredentialSubmissionResponse submitCredentials(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String[]> userCredentials)
        Checks for nulls in the arguments passed, verifies that the String array is of the correct length (2), and verifies if the email provided is authentic. If the arguments pass the check the UserDAO class is used in order to insert a batch set of user credentials data.
        Parameters:
        userCredentials - Hashmap of with key being the email mapped to a String array containing the hashed SHA-512 password in its first element and the corresponding salt for that hashed password.
        Returns:
        CredentialSubmission Response object specifying the status of the submission, if it was unsuccessful the response will contain the messages of any exceptions thrown upon trying to submit user credentials.
